title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 57 - Conditions Under Which A Dog Actively Immunized Against Rabies May Be At Large In Designated Areas Certified For Rabies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 57 - Conditions Under Which A Dog Actively Immunized Against Rabies May Be At Large In Designated Areas Certified For Rabies

State Regulations
§ 57.1 - Definitions
§ 57.2 - Privilege of vaccinated dogs to run at large in a designated area
§ 57.3 - Additional conditions to be complied with
§ 57.4 - Requirements for designated area

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 57

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §2140

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
